body_html: If you look closely at the argument types that were given to conv, you'll see that some of the tensors are torch.cuda.FloatTensors, while the others are torch.FloatTensors. You probably forgot to send the input to the GPU.
body_text: If you look closely at the argument types that were given to conv, you'll see that some of the tensors are torch.cuda.FloatTensors, while the others are torch.FloatTensors. You probably forgot to send the input to the GPU.
body: If you look closely at the argument types that were given to conv, you'll see that some of the tensors are `torch.cuda.FloatTensor`s, while the others are `torch.FloatTensor`s. You probably forgot to send the input to the GPU.
